cast.overview: Super spy Lance Sterling and scientist Walter Beckett are almost exact opposites. Lance is smooth, suave and debonair. Walter is… not. But what Walter lacks in social skills he makes up for in smarts and invention, creating the awesome gadgets Lance uses on his epic missions. But when events take an unexpected turn, Walter and Lance suddenly have to rely on each other in a whole new way.
cast.title: Spies in Disguise

details.biography: Peter S. Kim is a writer, comedian and actor. He is a series regular on the satirical animated comedy ‘Fairfax’. As a screenwriter, he staffed on the latest two seasons of HouseBroken, and has pitched and developed his original comedy pilots with ABC, FOX, NBC, Comedy Central, CBS Studios and Disney Channel. Peter spent 7 years in the tech industry working as a Strategic Data Analyst. In 2012, he pivoted from tech and relocated to Chicago, where he received a Jeff Award nomination for his performance in the critically acclaimed revue, 'A Red Line Runs Through It,' The Second City e.t.c.'s 40th revue.
details.name: Peter S. Kim
details.place_of_birth: Flushing, Queens, New York, United States
